Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1 is that it has been deployed on devnet for testing purposes. The mainnet deployment will happen after the testnets have been thoroughly tested.


There was a discussion about the upcoming Merge, which combines CL and EL into one single protocol. It's expected to be completed in Q3 of this year with an estimated timeline of 6-9 months from now.


The team is working on implementing the Bellatrix upgrade for Phase 1. The mainnet deployment will happen after it has been thoroughly tested on devnets, which should take around a month or two.


There was also discussion about the status of the Merge and its expected completion date in Q3 this year with an estimated timeline of 6-9 months from now.
